ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...How much did you drink the last time you drank?
Notes: 0 = Enough to get high or less; 1 = Enough to get drunk; 2 = Enough to pass out

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you often have hangovers on Sunday or Monday mornings?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Have you had the "shakes" when sobering up (hands tremble, shake inside)?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Often

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you get physically sick (e.g., vomit, stomach cramps) as a result of drinking?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Sometimes; 2= Almost every time I drink

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Have you had the "DTs" (delirium tremens) - that is, seen, felt or heard things not really there; felt very anxious, restless, and over excited?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...When you drink, do you stumble about, stagger, and weave?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Often

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...As a result of drinking, have you felt overly hot and sweaty (feverish)
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Once; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...As a result of drinking, have you seen things that were not really there?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Once; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you panic because you fear you may not have a drink when you need it?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Have you had blackouts ("loss of memory" without passing out) as a result of drinking?
Notes: 0 = No, never; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Often; 3 = Almost every time I drink

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you carry a bottle with you or keep one close at hand?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Some of the time; 2 = Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...After a period of abstinence (not drinking), do you end up drinking heavily again?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Sometimes; 2 = Almost every time I drink

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...have you passed out as a result of drinking?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Once; 2 = More than once

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Have you had a convulsion (fit) following a period of drinking?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you drink throughout the day?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...After drinking heavily, has your thinking been fuzzy or unclear?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes, but only for a few hours; 2 = Yes, for one or two days; 3 = Yes, for many days

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...As a result of drinking, have you felt your heart beating rapidly?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you almost constantly think about drinking and alcohol?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...As a result of drinking, have you heard "things" that were not really there?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Have you had weird and frightening sensations when drinking?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Once or twice; 2 = Often

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...As a result of drinking have you "felt things" crawling on you that were not really there (e.g., bugs, spiders)?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes; 2= Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...With respect to blackouts (loss; of memory):
Notes: 0 = Have never had a blackout; 1 = Have had blackouts that last less than an hour; 2 = Have had blackouts that last for several hours; 3 = Have had blackouts that last a day or more; a, b, c, d

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Have you tried to cut down on your drinking and failed?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Once; 2 = Several times

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...Do you gulp drinks (drink quickly?)
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months...After taking one or two drinks, can you usually stop?
Notes: 0 = Yes; 1 = No

ElementDescription: Suggested Care: Advice
Notes: Sum of items = 0

ElementDescription: Suggested Care: Brief Counseling (Level I)
Notes: Sum of items = 1-13

ElementDescription: Suggested Care: Out-Patient (Level I or II)
Notes: Sum of items = 14-21

ElementDescription: Suggested Care: Intensive Inpatient (Level II or III)
Notes: Sum of items = 22-30

ElementDescription: Suggested Care: Physical Intensive In-Patient (Level III or IV)
Notes: Sum of items = 31-47

ElementDescription: ADS Total Score
Notes: Sum of all items

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, how much did your romantic partner usually drink each time?
Notes: 1= Didn?t drink in the past 12 months; 2= Less than one can or glass; 3= one drink; 4= two drinks; 5= three drinks; 6= four drinks; 7= Five drinks; 8= six drinks; 9= seven or eight drinks; 10= nine or 10 drinks; 11= 11 to 15 drinks; 12= 16 to 20 drinks; 13= 21 to 25 drinks; 14= more than 25 drinks

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, how often did your partner drink five or more drinks when they were drinking?
Notes: 0= Not at all;  1= 1 to 3 times;  2= 4 to 7 times;  3= 8 to 11 times;  4= Once a month; 5= 2 to 3 times a month; 6= Once a week; 7= 2 to 3 times a week; 8= 4 to 6 times a week; 9= Daily

ElementDescription: Do any of your children live with you?
Notes: 0= No; 1= Yes, part time; 2= Yes, all of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, how often did your children see you drinking?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, how often did your children see your romantic partner drinking?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months, how often did your child(ren) see their other parent drinking?
Notes: 0= No other parent; 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months. Indicate below how often you drank in each of the following situations: When I was at home.
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months. Indicate below how often you drank in each of the following situations: When I was visiting friends or relatives (including parties, holiday, etc.)
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months. Indicate below how often you drank in each of the following situations: When I was out for dinner or for a meal
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months. Indicate below how often you drank in each of the following situations: When I was out at a bar
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: In the past 12 months. Indicate below how often you drank in each of the following situations: Other Situtations
Notes: 0= Never; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Most of the time

ElementDescription: Specify Other Place
In the past 12 months, how often did your romantic partner drink any alcoholic beverage?
Notes: 0= Not at all;  1= 1 to 3 times;  2= 4 to 7 times;  3= 8 to 11 times;  4= Once a month; 5= 2 to 3 times a month; 6= Once a week; 7= 2 to 3 times a week; 8= 4 to 6 times a week; 9= Daily

ElementDescription: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project (used for source IDs that change depending on timepoint/visit/etc.)
Number of drinks consumed
Notes: Number of drinks; -99 = N/A

ElementDescription: Level of intoxication
How many alcoholic drinks did you have yesterday?
Notes: Number of drinks; -99 = N/A

ElementDescription: How drunk or intoxicated did you get yesterday?
Notes: 0 = Not at all/I did not drink; 100 = Very drunk; -99 = NA

ElementDescription: 29. About how often in the last 12 months did you drink enough to feel drunk - that is, where drinking noticeably affected your thinking, talking, and behavior?
Notes: 0 = Never in those 12 months; 1 = 1 to 3 times in 12 months; 2 = 4 to 7 times in 12 months; 3 = 8 to 11 times in 12 months; 4 = 1 to 3 times a month; 5 = Once or twice a week; 6 = 3 to 4 times a week; 7 = 5 times a week or more; 99 = No data

ElementDescription: FOR MEN: During the last 12 months, how often did you have 5 or more drinks of wine, beer, or  liquor within a two-hour period? (Count as a drink a can or bottle of beer; a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry; a shot of liquor or a mixed drink or cocktail.)
Notes: 0 = Never in those 12 months; 1 = 1 to 3 times in 12 months; 2 = 4 to 7 times in 12 months; 3 = 8 to 11 times in 12 months; 4 = 1 to 3 times a month; 5 = Once or twice a week; 6 = 3 to 4 times a week; 7 = 5 times a week or more; 99 = No data

ElementDescription: FOR WOMEN: During the last 12 months, how often did you have 4 or more drinks of wine, beer, or  liquor within a two-hour period? (Count as a drink a can or bottle of beer; a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry; a shot of liquor or a mixed drink or cocktail.)
Notes: 0 = Never in those 12 months; 1 = 1 to 3 times in 12 months; 2 = 4 to 7 times in 12 months; 3 = 8 to 11 times in 12 months; 4 = 1 to 3 times a month; 5 = Once or twice a week; 6 = 3 to 4 times a week; 7 = 5 times a week or more; 99 = No data

ElementDescription: Binge drinking combined across gender - During the last 12 months, how often did you have 4 or more drinks of wine, beer, or liquor within a two-hour period? (Count as a drink a can or bottle of beer; a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry; a shot of liquor or a mixed drink or cocktail.)
Notes: 0 = Never in those 12 months; 1 = 1 to 3 times in 12 months; 2 = 4 to 7 times in 12 months; 3 = 8 to 11 times in 12 months; 4 = 1 to 3 times a month; 5 = Once or twice a week; 6 = 3 to 4 times a week; 7 = 5 times a week or more; 99 = No data

ElementDescription: Was the questionnaire administered during this visit?
Notes: 0 = No; 1 = Yes

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: Public place (e.g. restaurant, bar, concert, etc.)
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Alone
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Romantic/sexual partner(s)
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Friend(s)
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Coworkers
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Your parents
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Your siblings
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: Please think about with whom you usually drank alcohol within the past 6 months. (select all that apply) Other family members (e.g. cousins, aunts, uncles, etc.)
Notes: 0=Unselected; 1=Selected

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink: Alone
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink with: Romantic/sexual partner(s)
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink with: Friend(s)
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink with: Coworkers
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink with: Your parents
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink with: Your siblings
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often in the past 6 months did you drink with: Other family members (e.g. cousins, aunts, uncles, etc.)
Notes: 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: How often do your parents know that you are drinking?
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Rarely; 2=Sometimes; 3=Often; 4=Always

ElementDescription: To what extent do your parents currently approve of your drinking?
Notes: 0=Strongly disapprove; 2=Neither approve nor disapprove; 4=Strongly approve

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: Home
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: Friend's home
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: At a party
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: At a relative's home
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: In the car
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: At school
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more

ElementDescription: Indicate how often you drank alcohol at the following location in the past 6 months: Outside (for example: at a park, in the woods, etc.)
Notes: 0=Never; 1=At least once in the past 6 months; 2=About once a month; 3=More than once a month; 4=Once a week or more
